articles.title: Unraveling the origins of humanity: New research challenges single-origin theory - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Researchers explore the complex demographic history of Homo sapiens in Africa, revealing a reticulated population structure dating back to Marine Isotope Stage 5. The study challenges previous assumptions about archaic hominin contributions and emphasizes the…
articles.content:
In a recent study published in the journal Nature, researchers explore the differences between various demographic models using diversity-based statistics and linkage disequilibrium.

articles.author: Aliza Chasan
articles.title: NAACP issues travel advisory for Florida, says state "has become hostile to Black Americans" - CBS News
articles.description: The NAACP on Saturday issued a travel advisory for Florida, joining two other civil rights groups in warning potential tourists about the state's hostility "toward African Americans, people of color and LGBTQ+ individuals."
articles.content: The NAACP issued a formal travel advisory for Florida on Saturday in response to what the organization described as Gov. Ron DeSantis' "aggressive attempts to erase Black history and to restrict dive… [+2996 chars]
